**This is ShynaBack-end version 1.**

The wheel file will be created and used to maintain the Shyna backend class available for remaining functionality.

By Far we have follwing functionality at the backend:
- Shyna_CPUInfo
   
- Shyna_DiskInfo
   
- Shyna_Memory_Info
 
- ShynaTime
   
- ShynaDB 
   
- ShynaCheckOnline
   
- ShynaSpeak
